snippet.title: The Devil's Calculator: A Math Puzzle Game
snippet.description:
The new educational, non-profit math game by the creator of Synonymy. An evil calculator has its normal arithmetic operators replaced with sadistically obscure functions you must work backwards to interpolate with algebra. Using these corrupted operators to compute the number of the beast, 666, is the only way to purge the calculator of its demons and move on. A sophisticated and challenging math puzzle game for lovers of logic games, mathematics and numberphile. 

iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/the-devils-calculator/id1447599858?ls=1&mt=8

Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cinqmarsmedia.devilscalc

Once the game is conquered, a massive multiplayer online mode is unlocked where you play levels created by others who have beaten the game and create levels of your own to share with the community. More than 70 levels (with more to come), advanced graphing of functions  and hand drawn artwork makes this one of the most memorable and educational games of 2019.
